lenders.name: Jen Heeg
lenders.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach politics at Texas A&M's campus in Doha, Qatar.   My favorite classes to teach are "Politics of Global Inequality" and "World Politics."

lenders.name: Suzana
lenders.loan_because: I have travelled to many places in the world. I have seen a genuine kindness and selflessness in people who are in need and willing to do something to change that.  This is a great idea to promote financial independence. Kiva works. I hope they expand the program to the U.S.

lenders.name: Alpha-Zeus
lenders.loan_because: Potential is lost without opportunity.

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because: micro-loans WORK when most other approaches do not.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide psychological assessment, treatment, and knowledge because wisdom is the key to happiness - I help people use knowledge and science to improve their everyday lives.

lenders.name: chris
lenders.loan_because: this is the best idea I have seen in years
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a bank

lenders.name: Karin
lenders.loan_because: a little money can do so much!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Sales and Marketing for Hiatt Manufacturing, who produces a complete line of bird feeding and gardening accessories.

lenders.name: Betsey
lenders.occupational_info: I am a doctor who helps women who have breast problems, especially breast cancer.  I live in a part of the US where there are many women with breast cancer but, fortunately, most are able to survive and lead normal lives due to good medical care.  I am also interested in breast cancer care in other parts of the world, particularly in developing countries.

lenders.name: Israel
lenders.loan_because: My family believes in the great opportunities that microcredit provides to people around the world! Go Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: student

lenders.name: Peggy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the "Paying Forward" theory.  I was given a helping hand, not by an individual but by timing and circumstance.  Any "help up" should be repaid when the opportunity presents itself.  KIVA is my opportunity to repay.

lenders.name: Alexander Lamm
lenders.loan_because: I love helping other businesses acquire the necessary funds to expand or get their business started.  I feel it is important to share the world's resources equally and help each other wherever possible.  Thank you Kiva for making this possible!
lenders.occupational_info: I am the owner of Unlimited Mind which offers Brainwave Optimization to help clients balance their brains.   Brainwave Optimization balances brain activity from the lobes of one side of the brain to the other, and from the front of the brain to the back. The sole objective of brainwave optimization is to establish balance and harmony in the brain. Harmony refers to the way energy patterns function together from low to high in the various regions of the brain.

lenders.name: Brendan Campbell
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance at success.

lenders.name: Malcolm
lenders.occupational_info: I help small software companies market their products and grow their business.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Hopefully we can help people realize their dreams and better provide for their families.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in travel and tourism by marketing my city as a place to visit for vacation and business.
Dara is an attorney who helps people plan for their families and businesses.

lenders.name: The team at Ad4Good
lenders.loan_because: Every man worldwide should be rewarded for his hard work, irrespective of his country of origin. Thanks to the internet, we can finally free up capital from the West, stimulate entrepreneurship and help eradicate poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Ad4Good is a London-based advertising agency that makes basic products such as bottles of water free to the public by placing ads on their packaging.

lenders.name: kristl  VC 1981
lenders.loan_because: I believe that there is prosperity enough for all, if we all share what we can to assist others when they need it.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I'm very blessed.  Blessings should be shared.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I believe that if people in poverty are given a chance, a hand up, a microcredit loan, they will change their circumstances, their family, their community and their country for the better.
lenders.occupational_info:
I want to help Muhammad Yunis build his 
"Museum of Poverty" so when there is none, we can appreciate what it once was!

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people

lenders.name: Caprice & Jasmine
lenders.loan_because: What else would we spend our money on, more shoes?
lenders.occupational_info: Caprice is a  makeup artist  for TV & magazines.  Jasmine is a student and artist.

lenders.name: Stan
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people should always be given a chance to better their lives

lenders.name: Jayson
lenders.loan_because: "Still and all, why bother? Here's my answer. Many people need desperately to receive this message: I feel and think much as you do, care about many of the things you care about, although most people do not care about them. You are not alone." -Kurt Vonnegut
lenders.occupational_info: “I'm for truth, no matter who tells it. I'm for justice, no matter who it is for or against. I'm a human being, first and foremost, and as such I'm for whoever and whatever benefits humanity as a whole.” -Malcolm X

lenders.name: Kara
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I shop for the items needed to decorate our film sets. It's a fantastic, challenging experience everyday!

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: hopefully acts of kindness are contagious.  If you are reading this and are considering participation, lend now, help someone.   Your power to change a life is immeasurable.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.occupational_info: Interest rate risk management in banking.

lenders.name: Kutibh
lenders.loan_because:
I must be the change I want to see in the world.

If you give charity openly, it is good, but if you keep it secret and give to the needy in private, that is better for you, and it will atone for you some of your bad deeds. God is aware of all that you do. [The Qur'an 2:271]
lenders.occupational_info: Currently a neuropharmacology major at UCLA

lenders.name: Shelly
lenders.loan_because: We have so much and it is only right to share. It is also a honor :)
lenders.occupational_info: I care for people at a hospital. My primary focus is patients that are mentally ill and/ or mentally retarded. In other words special!

lenders.name: Philip & Cathy
lenders.loan_because: Traveled the world and know how lucky we are to live in the US.  Loans help share some of that luck.

lenders.name: Simply Me
lenders.loan_because:
"Never believe that a few caring people cannot change the world. 
For, indeed they are the only ones who ever have" 
Margaret Mead"
lenders.occupational_info:
Love IS the only way!

Each Life Affects Another

We may not always realize 
That every thing we do,
Affects not only our lives 
But touches others, too!

For a little bit of thoughtfulness 
That shows someone you care,
Creates a ray of sunshine
For both of you to share.

Yes, every time you offer 
Someone a helping hand ...
Every time you show a friend 
You care and understand ...

Every time you have 
A kind and gentle word to give ...
You help someone find beauty 
In this precious life we live.


For happiness brings happiness 
And loving ways bring love;
And Giving is the treasure 
That contentment is made of.


~ Amanda Bradley ~

lenders.name: Ross
lenders.loan_because: i like to watch goodness travel.

lenders.name: Oscar
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves. I believe that everyone deserves an opportunity and Kiva.org is the best way to give people just that.
lenders.occupational_info: I service low income families with life insurance. This helps them bury their deceased relatives without going bankrupt. I sell, service insurance to the roughest parts of town.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: Trying to help make the world just a little better than when I got here.
lenders.occupational_info: Interesting.

lenders.name: Mike and Christina
lenders.loan_because: We are very fortunate and want to share with others. Kiva is a great idea and we want to be a part of it.

lenders.name: elisabeth
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the difficulties of starting a business with little or no resourse. As was done for me, it's a pleasure to ease the hardships for someone else through a group effort.
lenders.occupational_info: I drive tractor/trailers for a company that transports racehorses. I sought a Class A CDL as a better way to support myself with a limited education. Best wishes and prosperity to all.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: It's great to give! I can think of many times in my life when a stranger did something for me so that I could move forward with my life. I am giving forward the blessing that was shared with me.
lenders.occupational_info:
Born and bred on the rough streets of Bronx, NY, Chris Gloss began life as a potential statistic.  The strong willed and charismatic son of a devoted single mother, Chris often found himself in challenging situations, as he discovered his natural ability to influence classmates and friends to follow his lead.  Fortunately, by high school, he made a life-changing decision to use his leadership abilities to influence others, solely, for their good.   

Further cultivation of Chris’ leadership abilities came as he defended his country in major conflicts, during his service in the United States Army.  Maximizing on his talent for motivating others to greatness, Chris would go on to become highly successful in the sales arena, reaching top levels at numerous prestigious corporations, while simultaneously coaching fellow employees to improbable new heights.  

An unrelenting passion for learning became the inspiration for a host of educational accomplishments at various respected institutions, including Mercer University, Central Texas College and Cameron University.  That same passion would carry over into the world of personal development, resulting in mentorship by such industry greats as Zig Ziglar, Tom Hopkins and Les Brown. 

Above and beyond impressive credentials, whether he is coaching sales teams or company execs, it’s unquestionably Chris’ inborn ability to arouse his audience with passion and conviction, to reach beyond self imposed limitations, that brands him the consummate motivator! 

Having reached the seemingly impossible in his own life, Chris Gloss truly is the message that he brings.

lenders.name: Gary & Sharon
lenders.occupational_info: Counselling and Personal Development

lenders.name: Virginia
lenders.loan_because: In February of 2008, I lent to KIVA a total of $250.00 to be disbursed on a micro-loan basis to a selection of worldwide entrepreneurs.  As little as $25 can be loaned to provide one less fortunate individual a hand up. As the loans are paid back, I am able to redeem the money or re-loan to an entrepreneur of my choice.  Since February 2008, my $250 has been invested and reinvested 51 times.  This is a great opportunity to see your charitable donations clearly at work.

lenders.name: Jackie
lenders.loan_because: I can, I care, and it's exciting to know that you have helped someone.

lenders.name: Crystal & Chris
lenders.loan_because: We believe in helping people  - starting in our community but also elsewhere.

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: it is a way to help others make a living and provide for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: teaching deaf and hard of hearing students

lenders.name: Yumiko & Tom
lenders.loan_because: We are excited to help bring opportunity, encouragement and support to the creative individuals seeking to better their lives. We feel fortunate that in some small way, we can help individuals reach for and fulfil their dreams.

lenders.name: Tamara
lenders.loan_because: I'm not rich, but I'm fortunate. I started with just $100, and re-loan it as soon as my credit gets above $25. I've made over 20 loans and counting, and I don't ever miss that $100. Best investment I've ever made.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: To help others be self sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with severe head injuries to recover as much independence as possible.

lenders.name: taylor
lenders.loan_because: i'm trying to be a better person.
lenders.occupational_info: i make pictures move.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: Because this is new adventures in serious fun.
lenders.occupational_info: Just love to design new and innovative automotive  technologies!

lenders.name: Gayle
lenders.loan_because: If you are given it, share it...
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a Course Design Director for online learning at my university.  I teach art online. 
My family is my world.

lenders.name: Libra Lender
lenders.loan_because: It helps me to "balance" what the U.S. has become lately.  I've always been interested in microlending  to women (enable them to fish!) and you've made it easy to stop procrastinating and do something about the need out there.

lenders.name: Mary Kay
lenders.loan_because: Part of my beliefs, as a pagan, is that each of us should help others when we can.  This is one way I am doing that.
lenders.occupational_info: Problem solver at a health insurance company

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I love to help those that want to have a better life but do not have the means to attempt it.
lenders.occupational_info: Ordering and managing materials.

lenders.name: Brott Family
lenders.loan_because: Try to help make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: Inspect food products  to make sure they are safe to consume. Design newspaper ads.

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.  What seems like a small amount to me goes a lot farther in other parts of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I care for chimpanzees rescued in the US from biomedical research, entertainment, and the pet trade.  Visit http://www.savethechimps.org to learn more.

lenders.name: Marisa
lenders.loan_because: I want others around the world to know people care.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a journalist

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I have a roof over my head, food on the table and free medical care. That's more than what most people in the world have.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide love and learning to children of new immigrants while their parents attend English class. I also contribute to students in need of financing in developing countries through The School Fund previously Education Generation.

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of entrepreneurship and giving a handup rather than a handout

lenders.name: Juan
lenders.loan_because: I can't just sit here and do nothing while people all over the world are asking for a chance.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I became a fan of micro-financing while studying economics at the University of Oklahoma.  The spot on CNN introduced me to KIVA - a very easy way to get involved and help others help themselves.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It is a good use of my money and I can loan and loan again.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies with their relations with their shareholders.

lenders.name: Jason Shah
lenders.loan_because: this is a great way for a college student on a budget to make a sustainable difference, many times over! Also, I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit and the role of small businesses in big economic development.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I want to repair the world - Tikkun Alom.
lenders.occupational_info: Semiconductors for Customer Premises Equipment (CPE) - DSL, GPON, EPON modems for use throughout the world

lenders.name: Lynda
lenders.loan_because: what goes around comes around

lenders.name: Mack
lenders.loan_because: I feel it something God wants me to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a high tech company in Grove City Ohio USA . Its very stressfull work.

lenders.name: leonard
lenders.loan_because: It would give me joy to see people with desires to become suscussful and fulfill their dreams
lenders.occupational_info: Keeping up with the daily demands of the restaurant. Making sure inventory, equipment and employees are up to level daily

lenders.name: Hoyle
lenders.loan_because: I believe that entrepreneurs are the driving force behind any economy, and small contributions go a lot further in their hands.
lenders.occupational_info: I fix big networks so that computers from different companies can talk to each other.

lenders.name: Ester
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Noel
lenders.loan_because: I love
lenders.occupational_info: Jazz violinist

lenders.name: Randy & M.E.
lenders.loan_because: Because we enjoy helping others

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: We should help, support, and love one another, after all we are brothers in Christ. I wish I could lend more and help more people; in the mean time I hope that all my friends join Kiva so we may help more folks.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work at Honda, where I help to create some of the best cars and trucks build.
I am a welder "by tittle: because most of the welding work is done by robots.
I have been bless by our Lord.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: It feels good knowing that I may help to change someone's life.  If you have why not give.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help.

lenders.name: Coty
lenders.occupational_info: I'm going to school to become a counselor.

lenders.name: Samuel
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in as many lives as possible. As a college student, I don't have much money either, but I want to help others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of elderly people who cannot take care of themselves. At my job, I cook, clean, and do laundry, and I pass medication.

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student. I'm still learning alot of things and I have no idea what I will do after school.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I enjoying helping people help themselves.

lenders.name: SCOTT
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others since I've been blessed with so many opportunities.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: Providing loans to others allows them the abilitiy provide for themselves and their families.  We are able to provide these opportunities because of the opportunities that we have been afforded.  I get very excited when I see the success that these individuals achieve with hard work and a small loan.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I was challenged by one of my pastors to give and take a step of faith in seeing God provide for me and others.
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer programs for people to use.

lenders.name: Dave & Linda
lenders.loan_because: The most powerful capital is good will.

lenders.name: K Eble
lenders.loan_because: We are blessed to have what we have and we want to help others achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I build hotels, hospitals and parking garages.

lenders.name: Ronney
lenders.loan_because: It's feels good to be able to help someone.  I would like to believe that those I can help will open themselves to helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I print signs & banners, business stationary, promotional products and novelty items.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I feel it's important to support our communities and the people who make up those communities.   For me, the world is our community.   We are all on the planet to live, laugh, love and grow.   We are all spiritual beings having a human experience together.   For me, supporting eachother in our journey is part of that experience.

lenders.name: darcy
lenders.loan_because: i want to make a small difference in a large world!
lenders.occupational_info:
i teach high school students about the past, present and future - of our history in America  and the World.
They also learn about government and economics, here and abroad.

lenders.name: Eva
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people a chance.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: God put us on the world together now we must stay together.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I have more than most.
lenders.occupational_info: I read a lot and study. My main area of interest is Philosophy and I hope to one day be able to teach it to others.

lenders.name: Darcie
lenders.loan_because: I have been poor - but thanks to where I live, I had the opportunity to work my way out of my poverty.  Also because of where I live, I can be a single Mom without any stigma or less opportunity.  I want to provide the same opportunities to others to become independent people, despite their geographical location or familial circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: I help large corporations create computer systems that grow their business.

lenders.name: Isaac
lenders.occupational_info: I'm almost 21 and don't have a job at the moment. I used to have a job as a telemarketer, but i needed to finish college to get a better job. As of now, I'm a full time student. I'm planning to start an internet cafe business, though I don't have enough money to consider as a good capital to start the business.

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: I am willing to help those who are willing to work hard to achieve success.
lenders.occupational_info: I advocate for the rights of our elderly.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: We really do need to be the change we want to see in this world.

lenders.name: Katrina
lenders.loan_because: it provides me a way to give back to the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I lead teams to validate automated business systems in the medical device field.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: Loaning is better than just giving and it promotes self-efficacy; when the loan is repaid, I just loan it back out again.
lenders.occupational_info: I do sociological research to help prevent HIV transmission among at-risk populations

lenders.name: Gila
lenders.loan_because: The small amounts mean almost nothing to me, while they can make a huge impact somewhere else - and I enjoy seeing where the money is going.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a freelance marketing professional, working from home.

lenders.name: kapper
lenders.loan_because: Most wonderful thing we can do is sharing a little bit with others and giving what we can to whom have needs, so they will do same with those who are in same situations they were previously...

lenders.name: Medstudent Wife
lenders.loan_because: I can, but many can't
lenders.occupational_info: I help make the workplace safe

lenders.name: Kris
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women achieve their dreams of being business owners! It is also important they have support and reassurance to do so, so here I am!!
lenders.occupational_info: The company I work for is a music publishing company. We help musicians/songwriters collect their money from various sources throughout the world.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I was given a Kiva gift certificate by people that I really admire, and I think this is a promising program.
lenders.occupational_info: I am raising my daughter and pursuing a Masters in Social Work.

lenders.name: Katie Murphy
lenders.loan_because:
It is amazing to have the opportunity to be a part of the start and growth of small businesses around the world! 
Microloans are such a powerful tool because they enable entrepreneurs to attain economic empowerment while retaining personal autonomy.

lenders.name: tartx
lenders.loan_because: life is beautiful and people need a hand sometimes. Kiva rocks!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a graphic and mixed media artist looking to help out my fellow artists around the globe. xo

lenders.name: Jan and Kevin Kesler
lenders.loan_because: We would like to help others, help themselves if we can.
lenders.occupational_info: Jan is a Nurse.  Kevin is an engineer.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and want to in turn bless others.
lenders.occupational_info: public interest.

lenders.name: BMAC
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed in so many ways and I want to make a difference for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I lead a global organization of people who plan and produce conventions and events.

lenders.name: Susan and Simon
lenders.loan_because: we want to be able to help others who have not had the advantages we enjoy by the good fortune of living in a country with a good social and health care system.

lenders.name: Rod
lenders.loan_because: To start a venture or expand a continuing business, sometimes all it takes is a little help from anyone willing to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I write technical documentation for a software business. My hobbies include writing short stories, poems, lyrics, and non fictional happenings.

lenders.name: Kip
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I write about computers, software, and software companies.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I can.  And I consider that fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a bank.

lenders.name: cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with a vocation that allows me to support others in many aspects of their lives.  We are of one race....the human race
lenders.occupational_info: I assist in healing the sick while advocating for wellness.  I work in a very busy Emergency Room and in remote communities many miles from my home.

lenders.name: Grace Katie
lenders.occupation: Registered Nurse - Chemical Dependency and Psychia

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: Poverty shouldn't exist.

lenders.name: Tom and Deb
lenders.loan_because: We know there is a need for financial help.  We admire those who want to work for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: We repair cars and trucks

lenders.name: Gwen
lenders.loan_because: I like to support those who are working hard to help themselves. It feels good to help people far away from here, so they know they have friends all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide counselling to help people deal with difficulties in their lives. I help them to heal and create the life they desire.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I am looking to help others who are willing to put in the effort neccessary to help themselves when an opportunity comes their way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer for a major U.S. insurance company working in the area supporting retirement plans.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: It's such a common sense way to share success.
lenders.occupational_info: I write articles for newspapers and magazines and complete writing and editing projects for corporate and nonprofit clients.

lenders.name: Kurt & Anne
lenders.loan_because: We are so impressed with the micro-loan model and are excited to be a part of this amazing tool to fight poverty

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is better to help people
lenders.occupational_info: I lead the planning and delivery of computer software projects.

lenders.name: Fiona
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others to help themselves, by lending money I am encouraging people to be financially independent rather than simply getting hand outs.

lenders.name: mustard seed
lenders.loan_because: We are a group of friends that believe that we need to help make life better for those that are less fortunate than us.  We all attend the same church,thus the mustard seed name.  We are hoping to have our group grow as well as the funds that we are able to loan and have some fun at the same time.
lenders.occupational_info: Our occupations,ages and backgrounds are all pretty varied.

lenders.name: Kandis
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of hard work and dedication. On Kiva, we can all support individuals that are already dedicated and working hard!
lenders.occupational_info: “I always wondered why somebody didn’t do something about that, then I realized I am somebody.” – Unknown

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: To help those who are less fortunate then myself

lenders.name: Ryan & Amy
lenders.loan_because: It is wonderful to see the entrepreneurial and human spirit thriving throughout the world.  We work hard and are rewarded for our efforts. The same should be true for each of these folks.
lenders.occupational_info: Manager of a finance group and a social worker in the school system in Colorado.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: everybody needs a helping hand to get started with a better life
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of people who are traveling on an airplane

lenders.name: Lynn n'Tim
lenders.occupation: Payroll Clerk, Mother, Grandmother, farm wife
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the value of a hardworking person in this world. If one person's life situation can be improved with a small loan then it is well worth the investment. Not only will their lives improve but they support their families and local economies as well.

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate and can share with others to encourage their success and happiness.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with mental illness and medical problems.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I think its important to help those less fortunate and in need, particularly in areas of the world that often gets overlooked.  As an immigrant to the states my parents have worked hard and I can relate to those who do as well.  I am thankful to have been given the opportunities presented before me and this is my way of giving back.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an architect.  I design and make drawings towards the construction of libraries, music halls, and schools.

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: I am a woman in business and lived in Liberia for two years. I know how important it is to have capital to increase income.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide computer programs to businesses that own buses. Their customers charter the buses to take trips.

lenders.name: Joe and Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: This was a gift from our daughter.  We think it's a wonderful way to help someone in a developing country to make a better life for themselves and their families.  It feels good to help people who are trying so hard to have a better life.

lenders.name: Deanna
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled a lot- Kiva gives me an opportunity to give back to the countries that have given me so much in life experience.  Also, because I see opportunities like Kiva as a chance for individuals to make the economic playing field just a little more level globally.
lenders.occupational_info: I educate people- school children, teachers, tourists- about the environment and fresh water.

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I print and dye fabric that I sew into quilts.

lenders.name: clinical organics
lenders.loan_because: to pay it forward

lenders.name: Peta & Jeongsoo
lenders.loan_because: We are inspired by the strength and courage our fellow human beings show in the world!
lenders.occupational_info:
Peta is a scientist by trade - however is currently teaching english to children in South Korea.

Jeongsoo is a film editor lusting for greener pastures....

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: it is a very easy way to make a very big impact in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I just recently graduated from college with degrees in  political science and Spanish.  I will be attending law school in the fall and am interested in international and environmental law.

lenders.name: Hamza
lenders.loan_because:
(Compiled in 2006):
* Almost half the world — over three billion people — live on less than $2.50 a day.
* At least 80% live on less than $10 a day.
* The poorest 40% of the world’s population account for 5% of global income. The richest 20% account for 75%.
* Based on enrolment data, about 72 million children of primary school age in the developing world were not in school in 2005; 57% of them were girls. And these are regarded as optimistic numbers...
* Nearly a billion people entered the 21st century unable to read a book or sign their names.
* Less than 1% of what the world spent every year on weapons was needed to put every child into school by the year 2000 and yet it didn’t happen.
* In 2005, the wealthiest 10% of the world accounted for 60% of total private consumption. The poorest 10%? Just 0.5%.
* 1.6 billion people — a quarter of humanity — live without electricity.
* For every $1 in aid a developing country receives, over $25 is spent on debt repayment.
* The poorer the country, the more likely it is that debt repayments are being extracted directly from people who neither contracted the loans nor received any of the money.
* A mere 12% of the world’s population use 85% of its water (by the way, the 12% in question do not live in the Third World).
* ......(extracted from http://www.globalissues.org/article/26/poverty-facts-and-stats)
lenders.occupational_info: I make steel.

lenders.name: Ozan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people get a hand up in life. And someday I want to be a bank!
lenders.occupational_info: I love motorcycles, classic cars, and anything with a motor.

lenders.name: Karalyn
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children anywhere from the age of 5-14 subjects such as; reading, writing, science, math, and social studies along with being a good example to my students.  I teach them the importance of character, integrity, work-ethic and positive thinking.

lenders.name: Glynis
lenders.loan_because: It is my duty to help others...just as I have been helped. It is the best way to show love for another.
lenders.occupational_info: Electrical product approval for a transportation agency.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because:
Creating a better world starts with each of us.  Anyone and everyone can make a difference.   
                                                                    For my students, knowing how to make a difference comes from having models of caring behavior, awareness of the needs of others, and a sense of personal responsibility to contribute to making the world a better place.  I believe that those of us who are fortunate have the responsibility to help those in need.  We are not here just to acquire things for ourselves.

lenders.name: Isaac Rau
lenders.loan_because:
Microfinance is an incredible idea to me.  I'm excited to be involved with it.

In the US, we fret over the exchange rate and how weak our dollar is compared to the British Pound and the Euro, but it's sailing strong compared to the majority of the world's countries. For example, in Azerbaijan and Uganada, several hundred dollars can purchase livestock and feed that can be worked into a profitable business venture - pretty amazing!

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I have always wanted to "do something" to help someone, but I didn't feel that I had enough to give. With Kiva I can help people with a small amount of money, but it can make such a huge difference in their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist project managers in the construction and/or marine industry.

lenders.name: Glenn
lenders.loan_because: I am self emp;oyed and I want others to do the same and succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a sales professional. I sell many electric power products.

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: “Leones or dollars, money is key to man’s survival, even if it is borrowed.” - Sierra Leonean Farmer

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: With a little help from a friend...amazing things can happen!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a  retired  elementary school teacher and principal.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It's not alot of money to me, but it IS alot of money to someone.  It's the least I can do.

lenders.name: Markus and Megan
lenders.loan_because: the Bible tells me so
lenders.occupational_info: it's not enough, but we'll do more some day

lenders.name: Bettina
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help from time to time - how lucky we are to be able to give a hand up with such a small investment.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired from health care - now enjoying traveling, singing and helping where I can.

lenders.name: Mykie
lenders.loan_because: Kokua
lenders.occupational_info: Youth Development and passion for the future

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I want to help and it makes me feel good to be able too.
lenders.occupational_info: I take pictures.

lenders.name: Brandon
lenders.loan_because:
Someone here in America, whose name is long forgotten,  took a chance on a young immigrant from Scotland by making him a loan to open a store.  Because of that chance, my family leads the blessed life it does today.  That is why I lend.

I am not a rich man, by U.S. standards.  But by the standards of the world, I have much more than I need.  So I give this little bit of money, because it is the "easy" part of being a business partner. I know that only YOUR own hard work can make it truly succeed.  When my name is long forgotten as a lender, your family and community will remember you and the difference you made in their lives!

I applaud all who have sought out Kiva for a loan, rather than a handout.  You are the real heroes on this site.  Please don't ever give up!!!

May the god of your choice bless you.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to try and provide custom printed course materials, as well as low cost, locally printed, textbooks for the students at The University of Texas at Austin.

lenders.name: Erik
lenders.loan_because: There is inequality in the world, and it disturbs me. I have the means to loan, therefore I do.

lenders.name: Doug & Karla
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people who are willing to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: We have a home-based business; exporting frozen vegetables

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I lend because it is simply away to help people who work hard to be successul in their lives .
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that provides navigation information for pilots of airplanes and ships all over the globe. My job gives me the opportunity to travel the world. I live in Parker, Colorado in the United States.

lenders.name: SUSAN & BILL
lenders.loan_because: I feel this is a great way to help people help themselves!  Where could we receive better return for such a small investment?
lenders.occupational_info: We are fortunate enough to have reached retirement age and can travel and enjoy our family.

lenders.name: MONICA
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people less fortunate than me and  give them the ability to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Farzan
lenders.loan_because: Giving away money has no effect other than satisfying someone’s immediate needs/wants . In fact it is detrimental - especially to relatives!. Helping out  someone to make good use of seed money is the way to go.
lenders.occupational_info: I help deliver engine-driven generators to customers.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky; I was born in the right place at the right time from amazing parents who have instilled in me a responsibility to help others less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: Geographic Information Systems (GIS) and Public Health research

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: Because the KIVA lending program is a great program that impacts the lives of those who are frequently overlooked.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work for the firm Executive Consulting for the Nonprofit Sector, Inc, a firm that works exclusively with nonprofit organizations in the areas of training, board development, interim management, transitional executive management, and succession planning.
"Taking Nonprofit Organizations To Higher Ground In Their Service To Others"™

lenders.name: Berryl
lenders.occupation: Business Sales Rep for wireless industry
lenders.loan_because: I Believe
lenders.occupational_info: I sell cell phones and other wireless devices.  I work in an office building.  I am a regional Representative in the Business Channel.  I travel by car to do business or I work wirelessly from my home or office..

lenders.name: D.C. Douglas
lenders.loan_because: I'm in awe of the disparity between the haves and have nots.
lenders.occupational_info: Actor in film and television shows.  Voice over artist, too.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people to help other people.  Everybody deserves a chance to go for their dreams and by everyone coming together to lend small amounts we can help turn peoples dreams into reality.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the most fantastic skincare and cosmetics company whose company motto is 'help people help other people' what more can i say....

lenders.name: Björn
lenders.loan_because:
I think it's a great opportunity to help somebody getting a better life. The personal approach is really interesting compared to aid organisations such as Red Cross, Save the Children etc where you do not get any feedback on how your own dollar was spent.

It's better helping somebody to buy a fishing boat then to give them a fish.

lenders.name: Hirohito
lenders.loan_because: I want someone to be active toward their future, to live with others with peaceful minds!
lenders.occupational_info: I work  to live, not only by myself but hopefully with many people and I wish making  a better world all together.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because:
We often take the luxuries that are provided for granted.

It's important to allow other parents the ability to provide for their families.

lenders.name: rooruu
lenders.loan_because: It can make a difference, that a little from my world can mean so much in a poorer part of the world to people with entrepreneurial commitment and energy.  This is a great adventure.

lenders.name: mohanbir
lenders.loan_because: One can only make a difference one step at a time.

lenders.name: Jeanette
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.  We all have a responsibility to assist when and where we can.

lenders.name: Eileen
lenders.loan_because: I wish I could do more.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 14-18 year olds World History and Law.

lenders.name: kaki
lenders.loan_because: It's a good idea to let money flow in this way..i think. We can simply give just 25 USD to  help people  improving their lives or making their dreams come true.

lenders.name: Sonia
lenders.loan_because: because I believe in giving back to those in need, especially when the world has given so much to me.

lenders.name: Floyd & Karen
lenders.loan_because: it's important to shrink the world to the size of a community . . . and we're all better off when our community prospers.

lenders.name: joseph
lenders.loan_because: it impresses the chicks.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help the world
lenders.occupational_info: I help people who are in the hospital to do better with swallowing, speaking and thinking.

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to get started in business without any money, so i am trying to contribute to helping others dreams come true.
lenders.occupational_info: Iam a computer professional, that works with a variety of software, music production, video ect.

lenders.name: ntshembo hope
lenders.loan_because: i want to start a small business which provides prepaid vending solutions e.g airtime and electricity to locals as well as to serve as a plut form for those wishing go the same route im in need of an amout of $900 U.S  about 7200  south african rands to buy the necesary equipments and start up stock
lenders.occupational_info: i find and aproach local companies which provides enovative tecknological products which will help inhance the local comunitys lifes by providing services such as mobile banking and prepaid vending

lenders.name: Omar
lenders.loan_because: its an effective way to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I respond to disasters both natural and man made.

lenders.name: Devin & Anabel
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I do a project called The Insignificant Project and we see the importance and impact of small dedicated efforts to helping others. I see Kiva as an amazing opportunity to help people create business opportunities that will have long term impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a freelance photographer and i shoot primarily music artists, Anabel is a make up artist.  We live in Los Angeles and Paris.

lenders.name: maggie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others be successful in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Language Arts teacher which means I teach both Reading and English. I work with 7th graders.

lenders.name: Carlos
lenders.loan_because: Thanks to Kiva I am now able to help others through out the world that require a little financial push to get a business started, or to improve their business.  I am grateful for living in a capitalistic economy; and I feel like all should experience the benefits of capitalism, not the harshness.  Kiva allows others to enjoy the nice things of capitalism, which is why I greatly admire the organization.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for one of the worlds largest defense contractors performing IT support for their space and business units.

lenders.name: Honsell & Shizuko
lenders.loan_because: We just want to help someone in some small way.
lenders.occupational_info: My wife and I are in our mid 60s and retired.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Good for the soul
lenders.occupational_info: Bring Boring Things to Life

lenders.name: Damon
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others succeed in life and I feel that I can make the greatest impact by lending directly to those in need.  I hope that I can make a difference by investing in the success of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the medical field and I am currently applying to MBA programs that have an emphasis in health care management.  I hope to one day work for a pharmaceutical or biotech company that values social responsibility as well as profitability.

lenders.name: K.C.
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.occupational_info: I run a small company that installs and fixes computers for small businesses

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I became ill and unable to work; I had/have a long road to getting better and currently putting myself back into school to a career that my current condition will allow. I have very little money and actually loaned via credit card, but when I heard of this organization and given what I have had to face over the past years I have come to a realization that money is nothing. Without your health and the ones you love by your side life is meaningless. Knowing that what little I can give is going to help a family somewhere in the world that needs it is worth any amount of monetary interest.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a network engineer until I became disabled. I am currently going back to school to become a teacher which will be less demanding on my health but more importantly I am studying my passion which is physics. I hope that in teaching I can inspire the next generation to learn and make better the world in which we live in through science.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: giving is living

lenders.name: Martha
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to work, provide for their families, and contribute to the success of the community they live in.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people achieve their goals at work by creating learning resources and making organizational systems easier to navigate.

lenders.name: Karin
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of changing one's own life.

lenders.name: Matt & Niki
lenders.loan_because: It's a great opportunity help others while watching a business grow!
lenders.occupational_info: Work for a very large company to ensure their financial statements are accurate

lenders.name: ZULEKA
lenders.loan_because: I would like to make a difference to anybody out there.
lenders.occupational_info: God gave to me, so i wanna help those less fortunate then me.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I can and should and will!

lenders.name: julio Barton
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others who have less than me and in dedication of my Mother and Father.
lenders.occupational_info: I audit companies for quality and environmental systems

lenders.name: michael
lenders.loan_because: I was helped with a small loan to open my first business.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is a very big part of my life and has helped me define who I am.

lenders.name: bpbarnesok
lenders.loan_because: Because I have been given much, I too must give; Because of thy great bounty, Lord, each day I live. I shall divide my gifts from thee, with every brother that I see who has the need of help from me. Because I have been blessed by thy great love, dear Lord. I'll share thy love again, according to Thy word. I shall give love to those in need; I'll show that love by word and deed: Thus shall my thanks be thanks in deed.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide support for computers and other technology resources in the veterinary medical field.

lenders.name: stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I value the individual effort of all of these people to make their lives better.

lenders.name: erica
lenders.loan_because: i have so i want all to have
lenders.occupational_info: i am importer and designer of costume jewellery

lenders.name: Imaginary Alpacas
lenders.loan_because: I can help others help themselves through Kiva while teaching my daughter to share her good fortune. I truly admire these wonderful people who are able to make their small businesses work and support their families. We can all learn a lot from them.
lenders.occupational_info: I care for my family. I help keep my alpacas healthy and spin their wool into yarn. Then I knit or weave it into products I hope to sell to support my family. Alpacas are the stress relief in my life. We are hopeful to be as successful as these entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Márcia
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference! :-)
lenders.occupational_info: I perform software testing for different kind of apps (desktop, web, financial...)

lenders.name: Kirby
lenders.loan_because: It is a simple and powerful way to promote the entrepreneurial spirit and make lives better around the world.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: Imagine helping a small business or family in need for about the cost of a dinner at Red Lobster.  I am trying to expand my business and so I am hoping this will send me some good Karma.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a small 12 room roadside inn.  The rooms are small but very comfortable.   It is very hard work and I don't make a lot of money but it is fun.  I am a single father to a 15 year old boy I adopted from Russia when he was five years old.

lenders.name: Chocolate Diamonds
lenders.loan_because:
God has blessed me with sooo much, two beautiful daughters and provision beyond my means.  "I Love The Lord" so I give as a way of expressing my love for him and his people in need.

Love You All,
Tanya

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: God has provided more than I need and allows me the opportunity to joyfully give to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I study human parasites, hopefully to improve health for people around the world.

lenders.name: Mayra
lenders.loan_because: A little money for me can make a big difference in another person's life.
lenders.occupational_info: Deal with low income individuals.

lenders.name: Alexis
lenders.loan_because: I believe in all of us.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an actor in theater and films. My goal is to do international work that speaks to everyone about the deep and simple truths of humanity.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: To many of us a couple of hundred dollars is a night out with friends,  To these budding business owners it is the difference between poverty and a chance at that dream we take for granted.
lenders.occupational_info: I know live in Changzhou, Jiangsu Province. China and being retired I get to volunteer in various ways. From playing Santa to the homeless at the Salvation Army to helping  with fundraising for a couple of small groups.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.occupational_info: Student in journalism program

lenders.name: Marlene
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I decorate vacant and occupied homes to make them look more appealing to a greater number of potential buyers.

lenders.name: aleks
lenders.loan_because: i care

lenders.name: Danny
lenders.loan_because: it helps
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of premature babies

lenders.name: Vincent
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance for a positive future, I hope my small contribution can help make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I design computer software that helps young people communicate in their own way.

lenders.name: The Miner's
lenders.loan_because: God wants everyone to have giving heart!  I share because of my love for people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for the daily financial operations of a public library.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: I want to help, I would want someone to help me, and I care.
lenders.occupational_info: Student in the Criminal Justice field

lenders.name: Ralph
lenders.loan_because: I make pretty good money and want to use some of it to help others.  Microlending through Kiva seems to be a way to get a big impact and provide maximum benefit for the money I provide.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large computer systems vendor as a technical trainer.  I teach computer administrators and engineers how to run the systems they bought from us better and more efficiently.

lenders.occupational_info: Small business owner
